sql.comment: update sum of services after insert sub-service
sql.sql: CREATE TRIGGER upd_summ_insert AFTER INSERT ON sub_services FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE services a, ( select sum(s1.tariff)as sum, s1.service_id as service_id  from sub_services as s1  group by s1.service_id) b SET a.tariff  = b.sum where a.service_id = b.service_id; END//

sql.comment: update sum of services after update sub-service
sql.sql: CREATE TRIGGER upd_summ_update  AFTER UPDATE ON sub_services FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE services a, ( select sum(s1.tariff)as sum, s1.service_id as service_id  from sub_services as s1  group by s1.service_id) b SET a.tariff  = b.sum where a.service_id = b.service_id; END//
